price: Na ama akiwa katika walio kadhibisha wapotovu,
arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
footnotes: Na ama akiwa ni katika wa kushoto, wanao kanusha, walio wapotovu,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā in kāna mina al-mukadhibīna al-ḍālīna
